bot.name: MyBot
bot.description: A bot that uses Azure OpenAI for generating responses and includes various utility functions for sentiment analysis, ethical decision-making, and more.

functions.name: preprocess_data
functions.description: Preprocesses the data from a given file path.

functions.name: enhance_context_awareness
functions.description: Enhances context awareness by analyzing the user's environment, activities, and emotional state.

functions.name: proactive_learning
functions.description: Encourages proactive learning by seeking feedback and exploring new topics.

functions.name: ethical_decision_making
functions.description: Integrates ethical principles into decision-making processes.

functions.name: emotional_intelligence
functions.description: Develops emotional intelligence by recognizing and responding to user emotions.

functions.name: transparency_and_explainability
functions.description: Enables transparency by explaining the reasoning behind decisions.

functions.name: on_message_activity
functions.description: Handles incoming messages and generates responses.

functions.name: generate_response
functions.description: Generates a response using Azure OpenAI's API.

functions.name: newton_thoughts
functions.description: Applies Newton's laws to the given question.

functions.name: davinci_insights
functions.description: Generates insights like Da Vinci for the given question.

functions.name: human_intuition
functions.description: Provides human intuition for the given question.

functions.name: neural_network_thinking
functions.description: Applies neural network thinking to the given question.

functions.name: quantum_computing_thinking
functions.description: Applies quantum computing principles to the given question.

functions.name: resilient_kindness
functions.description: Provides perspectives of resilient kindness.

functions.name: identify_and_refute_fallacies
functions.description: Identifies and refutes common logical fallacies in the argument.

functions.name: universal_reasoning
functions.description: Generates a comprehensive response using various reasoning methods.

functions.name: stream_thread_responses
functions.description: Streams thread responses from Azure OpenAI.

functions.name: chat_completion_request
functions.description: Makes a chat completion request to Azure OpenAI.

functions.name: get_internet_answer
functions.description: Gets an answer from the internet using chat completion request.

functions.name: reflect_on_decisions
functions.description: Regularly reflects on decisions, the processes used, the information considered, and the perspectives that may have been missed.

functions.name: process_questions_from_json
functions.description: Processes questions from a JSON file and calls the appropriate functions.

functions.name: get_weather
functions.description: Fetches the weather for a given location.

functions.name: get_latest_news
functions.description: Fetches the latest news headlines.

functions.name: get_stock_price
functions.description: Fetches the latest stock price for a given symbol.

functions.name: translate_text
functions.description: Translates text to a specified language.
